languages.text: "Мое ремесло — знать всех нужных людей и нелюдей, налаживать связи и обеспечивать, чтобы драгоценный товар оказывался в руках не менее драгоценных клиентов. Моя мудрость включает в себя познания о врагах Человечества, будь то {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} или самые отпетые негодяи Империума, а также самые свежие сведения о том, почем сейчас идут те или иные диковинки на рынке {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g}. Со мной, шерин, вас не обманут даже самые ушлые ажи — это я вам обещаю. Коль сама я владею кое-чем, так, значит, смогу обеспечить это и вам — если, конечно, вам мало ваших фантастических богатств".

traits.locale_text: "Мое ремесло — знать всех нужных людей и нелюдей, налаживать связи и обеспечивать, чтобы драгоценный товар оказывался в руках не менее драгоценных клиентов. Моя мудрость включает в себя познания о врагах Человечества, будь то {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} или самые отпетые негодяи Империума, а также самые свежие сведения о том, почем сейчас идут те или иные диковинки на рынке g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g}. Со мной, шерин, вас не обманут даже самые ушлые ажи — это я вам обещаю. Коль сама я владею кое-чем, так, значит, смогу обеспечить это и вам — если, конечно, вам мало ваших фантастических богатств".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "My trade means knowing the right people and non-people, having the right connections, and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of my no-less-precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Humankind, be they {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for any particular curio at the {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} market. Not even the most cunning azhi will deceive you as long as I am with you, shereen — I promise you that. Whatever I have can be yours too — if your unfathomable wealth isn't enough for you already, I mean."
languages.original_text: "Мое ремесло — знать всех нужных людей и нелюдей, налаживать связи и обеспечивать, чтобы драгоценный товар оказывался в руках не менее драгоценных клиентов. Моя мудрость включает в себя познания о врагах Человечества, будь то {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} или самые отпетые негодяи Империума, а также самые свежие сведения о том, почем сейчас идут те или иные диковинки на рынке {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g}. Со мной, шерин, вас не обманут даже самые ушлые ажи — это я вам обещаю. Коль сама я владею кое-чем, так, значит, смогу обеспечить это и вам — если, конечно, вам мало ваших фантастических богатств".

traits.locale_text: "My trade means knowing the right people and not-people, having the right connections and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of no less precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Mankind, be they maadari or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for one curio at the Footfall market or another. Not even the most cunning daevas will deceive you as long as I am with you, shereen — I promise you that. If I have something, I will be able to provide it for you too — if you think your unfathomable wealth isn't enough."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My trade means knowing the right people and not-people, having the right connections and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of no less precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Mankind, be they maadari or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for one curio at the Footfall market or another. traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “做我们这一行，意味着要认识合适的人与异形，拥有合适的联络人，确保珍贵的货物能顺利交付到我那些不那么珍贵的客户手中。我的智慧包括对人类之敌的充分了解，无论是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，还是帝国最底层的人渣。此外，我还很了解货物的价格，知道各种各样的文物在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的市场上能卖到多少钱。我可以向你保证，亲爱的，只要我在你身边，哪怕是最狡猾的鬼怪也骗不了你。而且，如果你那深不见底的财富依然无法满足你的渴求，那我所拥有的一切也可以归你所有。”
languages.original_text: "My trade means knowing the right people and non-people, having the right connections, and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of my no-less-precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Humankind, be they {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for any particular curio at the {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} market. Not even the most cunning azhi will deceive you as long as I am with you, shereen — I promise you that. Whatever I have can be yours too — if your unfathomable wealth isn't enough for you already, I mean."

traits.locale_text: “做我们这一行，意味着要认识合适的人与异形，拥有合适的联络人，确保珍贵的货物能顺利交付到我那些不那么珍贵的客户手中。我的智慧包括对人类之敌的充分了解，无论是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，还是帝国最底层的人渣。此外，我还很了解货物的价格，知道各种各样的文物在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的市场上能卖到多少钱。我可以向你保证，亲爱的，只要我在你身边，哪怕是最狡猾的鬼怪也骗不了你。而且，如果你那深不见底的财富依然无法满足你的渴求，那我所拥有的一切也可以归你所有。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "My trade means knowing the right people and non-people, having the right connections, and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of my no-less-precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Humankind, be they xenos or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for any particular curio at the Footfall market. Not even the most cunning azhi will deceive you as long as I am with you, shereen — I promise you that. Whatever I have can be yours too — if your unfathomable wealth isn't enough for you already, I mean."

languages.text: «Mi negocio incluye conocer a la gente y no gente indicada, tener las relaciones adecuadas y asegurarme de que los bienes más preciados acaban en las manos de mis clientes igualmente preciados. Mis conocimientos incluyen a los enemigos de la Humanidad, sean {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} o la peor escoria del Imperium, y también información actualizada sobre cuánto se paga por cualquier artefacto interesante en el mercado de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}. Ni los azhi más astutos pueden engañar{mf|le|la} mientras esté a su lado, shereen: eso se lo prometo. Lo mío puede ser también suyo... si su inmensa riqueza no le parece suficiente, claro».
languages.original_text: "My trade means knowing the right people and non-people, having the right connections, and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of my no-less-precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Humankind, be they {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for any particular curio at the {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} market. Not even the most cunning azhi will deceive you as long as I am with you, shereen — I promise you that. Whatever I have can be yours too — if your unfathomable wealth isn't enough for you already, I mean."

traits.locale_text: «Mi negocio incluye conocer a la gente y no gente indicada, tener las relaciones adecuadas y asegurarme de que los bienes más preciados acaban en las manos de mis clientes igualmente preciados. Mis conocimientos incluyen a los enemigos de la Humanidad, sean {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} o la peor escoria del Imperium, y también información actualizada sobre cuánto se paga por cualquier artefacto interesante en el mercado de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}. Ni los azhi más astutos pueden engañar{mf|le|la} mientras esté a su lado, shereen: eso se lo prometo. Lo mío puede ser también suyo... si su inmensa riqueza no le parece suficiente, claro».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしの取引とは、適切な人物やそうでない人物を知り、適切なコネクションを持ち、貴重な品物がありきたりな顧客の手に渡るようにすることさ。あたしの知恵には、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}であれ帝国の最底辺のクズであれ、人類の敵に関する知識や、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の市場で特定の珍品がいくらで売られているかに関する最新の知識も含まれている。アタシがいる限り、どんなに狡猾なアジーでもあんたを欺くことはできないさ…そいつは約束するよ。あたしが持っているものは何でも、あんたのものにもなる…あんたの底知れぬ富がすでに十分でないのなら、だけど」
languages.original_text: "My trade means knowing the right people and non-people, having the right connections, and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of my no-less-precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Humankind, be they {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for any particular curio at the {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} market. Not even the most cunning azhi will deceive you as long as I am with you, shereen — I promise you that. Whatever I have can be yours too — if your unfathomable wealth isn't enough for you already, I mean."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしの取引とは、適切な人物やそうでない人物を知り、適切なコネクションを持ち、貴重な品物がありきたりな顧客の手に渡るようにすることさ。あたしの知恵には、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}であれ帝国の最底辺のクズであれ、人類の敵に関する知識や、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の市場で特定の珍品がいくらで売られているかに関する最新の知識も含まれている。アタシがいる限り、どんなに狡猾なアジーでもあんたを欺くことはできないさ…そいつは約束するよ。あたしが持っているものは何でも、あんたのものにもなる…あんたの底知れぬ富がすでに十分でないのなら、だけど」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "In meiner Branche muss ich die richtigen Menschen und Nicht-Menschen kennen, die richtigen Verbindungen haben, und dafür sorgen, dass die wertvolle Ware ihren Weg in die Hände meiner ebenso wertvollen Kunden findet. Meine Weisheit enthält das Wissen der Feinde der Menschheit, ob sie nun {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} sind oder der schlimmste Abschaum des Imperiums, sowie das neueste Wissen, welche Preise auf dem Markt von {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} für welche Waren aufgerufen werden. Nicht einmal der gerissenste Azhi wird Euch übers Ohr hauen, so lange ich bei Euch bin, Shereen — das verspreche ich Euch. Was immer ich habe, kann auch Euch gehören — falls Euer unerschöpflicher Reichtum Euch nicht bereits reicht."
languages.original_text: "My trade means knowing the right people and non-people, having the right connections, and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of my no-less-precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Humankind, be they {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for any particular curio at the {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} market. Not even the most cunning azhi will deceive you as long as I am with you, shereen — I promise you that. Whatever I have can be yours too — if your unfathomable wealth isn't enough for you already, I mean."

traits.locale_text: "In meiner Branche muss ich die richtigen Menschen und Nicht-Menschen kennen, die richtigen Verbindungen haben, und dafür sorgen, dass die wertvolle Ware ihren Weg in die Hände meiner ebenso wertvollen Kunden findet. Meine Weisheit enthält das Wissen der Feinde der Menschheit, ob sie nun {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} sind oder der schlimmste Abschaum des Imperiums, sowie das neueste Wissen, welche Preise auf dem Markt von {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} für welche Waren aufgerufen werden. Nicht einmal der gerissenste Azhi wird Euch übers Ohr hauen, so lange ich bei Euch bin, Shereen — das verspreche ich Euch. Was immer ich habe, kann auch Euch gehören — falls Euer unerschöpflicher Reichtum Euch nicht bereits reicht."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Pour réussir dans mon métier, il faut nouer des relations avec des individus bien placés, humains ou non, et veiller à ce que les précieuses marchandises parviennent entre les mains des clients tout aussi précieux. Il est tout aussi important de connaître les ennemis de l'humanité, qu'il s'agisse des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ou des plus viles vermines de l'Imperium, et de se tenir au courant du cours des produits de valeur qui se vendent sur le marché de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. Tant que je serai à vos côtés, shereen, même les plus rusés des azhi ne pourront pas vous duper. Je vous le garantis. Tout ce qui m'appartient est à votre disposition, si votre richesse incommensurable ne vous suffit pas. »
languages.original_text: "My trade means knowing the right people and non-people, having the right connections, and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of my no-less-precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Humankind, be they {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for any particular curio at the {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} market. Not even the most cunning azhi will deceive you as long as I am with you, shereen — I promise you that. Whatever I have can be yours too — if your unfathomable wealth isn't enough for you already, I mean."

traits.locale_text: « Pour réussir dans mon métier, il faut nouer des relations avec des individus bien placés, humains ou non, et veiller à ce que les précieuses marchandises parviennent entre les mains des clients tout aussi précieux. Il est tout aussi important de connaître les ennemis de l'humanité, qu'il s'agisse des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ou des plus viles vermines de l'Imperium, et de se tenir au courant du cours des produits de valeur qui se vendent sur le marché de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. Tant que je serai à vos côtés, shereen, même les plus rusés des azhi ne pourront pas vous duper. Je vous le garantis. Tout ce qui m'appartient est à votre disposition, si votre richesse incommensurable ne vous suffit pas. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Mesleğim; doğru insanları ve insan olmayanları tanımak, doğru bağlantılar kurmak ve değerli ürünlerimin bir o kadar değerli müşterilerimin eline ulaşmasını sağlamak. Bilgi sahibi olmam gereken şeylerden biri de İnsanlığın düşmanlarıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenoymuş{/g}, İmparatorluk'taki en adi pisliklermiş fark etmez. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} pazarında belli tür ürünlere biçilen en güncel fiyatlara da hâkim olmam gerekir. Ben yanındayken en kurnaz azhi bile seni aldatamaz şirinim, şüphen olmasın. Akıl almaz büyüklükteki servetin sana yetmiyorsa benim olan her şeye de sahip olabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "My trade means knowing the right people and non-people, having the right connections, and making sure the precious goods find their way into the hands of my no-less-precious customers. My wisdom includes the knowledge of the enemies of Humankind, be they {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} or the lowest scum in the Imperium, as well as the latest knowledge about how much they charge for any particular curio at the {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} market. Not even the most cunning azhi will deceive you as long as I am with you, shereen — I promise you that. Whatever I have can be yours too — if your unfathomable wealth isn't enough for you already, I mean."

traits.locale_text: "Mesleğim doğru insanları ve insan olmayanları tanımak, doğru bağlantılara sahip olmak ve değerli ürünlerimin daha az değerli olmayan müşterilerimin eline ulaşmasını sağlamak. Bilgi sahibi olmam gereken şeylerden biri de İnsanlığın düşmanlarıdır. İster {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} olsunlar, ister İmparatorluk'un en adi pislikleri. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} pazarında belli tip ürünlere ne kadar fiyat biçildiği konusunda da en güncel bilgiye sahip olmam gerekir. Benim yanında olduğun sürece en kurnaz azhi bile seni aldatamaz şirinim, garanti ederim. Benim olan her şey de senin olabilir. Akıl almaz servetin senin için yeterli değilse tabii."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
